brownshome.scriptwars.server.connection

Class ConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • brownshome.scriptwars.server.connection.ConnectionHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UDPConnectionHandler

    public abstract class ConnectionHandler
extends Object
    This class handles the connections to each player and times out players when they take too long. Booleans are packed, all other data types are byte alligned. Strings have a short prefixed to them representing the length of the string.

      • waitForResponses

        public void waitForResponses(long cutoffTime)

      • sendData

        public void sendData()
        Sends all data relevant to a game

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Generates an ID for this game, the first byte is a protocol identifier, the next byte is the game ID, the last byte is a player id. The MSB is zero. If the number is negative there was no free ID to be generated

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer(int playerCode)
        Gets a player given their playerCode. The code must be in the byte range.
        Parameters:
        playerCode - The slot of the connected player.
        Returns:
        The player, or null if there is no such player

      • getPlayerCount

        public int getPlayerCount()
        Gets the number of active players
        Returns:
        The number of active players currently on the server
